creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: nine lines of calligraphy written on every other panel; signature at UL; rectangular intaglio stamp URC; square relief stamp UL; dark border at top and bottom of fan; mounted on black mat
markings: URC, rectangular intaglio stamp; L center square relief; on back, LRQ, in pencil: [Gozan]
title: Poem
